channel.title: StringCompare on Nothing to Do
channel.description: Recent content in StringCompare on Nothing to Do

item.title: (Draft) Knuth, Morris, Pratt (KMP) Pattern Matching Algorithm
item.description: Overview 字串是一個由字元所組成的有限集合，字串的比對有許多方法，其中最簡單的是選定一個起始點向下比對，若是遇到不符合 Pattern 的字串，即起始點向下挪動一格再重新啟動 Pattern 比對，其程式方法如下： int findString(char *string, char *pattern) { int startStringPos = 0, endStringPos = strlen(string)-1; int patternTotalLen = strlen(pattern)-1; int endMatchingPos = patternTotalLen; for (int i = startStringPos; endMatchingPos <= endStringPos; ) { if (string[endMatchingPos] == pattern[endPatternPos]) { for (int j = 0; i = startStringPos; j < endPatternPos && string[i] == pattern[j]; i++, j++); } if (j == patternTotalLen) { return startStringPos; } endMatchingPos++; startStringPos++; } return -1; } 這個程式主要運作起來長這樣：
